rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 135: Line 135:
===Olympic rugby===
===Olympic rugby===
â
[[Image:Olympics postcard.jpg|thumb|220px|left|A postcard of the rugby event at the [[1924 Summer Olympics|1924]] Olympics.]]
  â  
[[Rugby union at the Summer Olympics|Rugby union]] was played at the [[Olympic Games]] in 1900, 1908, 1920 and 1924. As per Olympic rules, the nations of Scotland, Wales and England were not allowed to play separately as they are not sovereign states. [[Rugby sevens]] has been played at the [[Commonwealth Rugby Sevens Championships|Commonwealth Games]] since 1998 and on 9 October 2009, the [[International Olympic Committee]] voted with a majority of 81 to 8 that rugby be reinstated as an Olympic sport in at least the [[2016 Summer Olympics|2016]] and [[2020 Summer Olympics|2020]] games, but in the [[rugby sevens|sevens]], 4-day tournament format.<ref name="I.O.C. Decision">{{cite web|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2009/08/14/sports/14sports.html |title=I.O.C. Decision Draws Cheers and Complaints From Athletes |publisher=''The New York Times'' |first=Jeff |last=Klein |date=2009-08-13 |accessdate=2009-08-13}}</ref><ref>http://cbs11tv.com/sports/golf.rugby.olympics.2.1238472.html</ref> This is something the rugby world has aspired to for a long time and Bernard Lapasset, president of the International Rugby Board, said the Olympic gold medal would be considered to be "the pinnacle of our sport" (Rugby Sevens).<ref>http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport2/hi/olympic_games/8292584.stm</ref>
[[Rugby union at the Summer Olympics|Rugby union]] was played at the [[Olympic Games]] in 1900, 1908, 1920 and 1924. As per Olympic rules, the nations of Scotland, Wales and England were not allowed to play separately as they are not sovereign states. [[Rugby sevens]] has been played at the [[Commonwealth Rugby Sevens Championships|Commonwealth Games]] since 1998 and on 9 October 2009, the [[International Olympic Committee]] voted with a majority of 81 to 8 that rugby be reinstated as an Olympic sport in at least the [[2016 Summer Olympics|2016]] and [[2020 Summer Olympics|2020]] games, but in the [[rugby sevens|sevens]], 4-day tournament format.<ref name="I.O.C. Decision">{{cite web|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2009/08/14/sports/14sports.html |title=I.O.C. Decision Draws Cheers and Complaints From Athletes |publisher=''The New York Times'' |first=Jeff |last=Klein |date=2009-08-13 |accessdate=2009-08-13}}</ref><ref>http://cbs11tv.com/sports/golf.rugby.olympics.2.1238472.html</ref> This is something the rugby world has aspired to for a long time and Bernard Lapasset, president of the International Rugby Board, said the Olympic gold medal would be considered to be "the pinnacle of our sport" (Rugby Sevens).<ref>http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport2/hi/olympic_games/8292584.stm</ref>
